data.title: Nigerian states
data.text:
Rulers: Nigeria

States

Note: On 27 May 1967 the regions were dissolved and 12 states created instead, which were subsequently further divided into 19 states (17 Mar 1976), 21 states (23 Sep 1987), 30 states (27 Aug 1991), and 36 states (1 Oct 1996).

Abia

27 Aug 1991 Abia state created from part of Imo Administrator 28 Aug 1991 - Jan 1992 Frank Ajobena Governor Jan 1992 - Nov 1993 Ogbonnaya Onu (b. 1951 - d. 2024) Administrators 9 Dec 1993 - 14 Sep 1994 Ike Nwosu (b. 1946) 14 Sep 1994 - 22 Aug 1996 Temi Ejoor 22 Aug 1996 - Aug 1998 Moses Fasanya Aug 1998 - May 1999 Anthony Obi (b. 1952 - d. 2022) Governors 29 May 1999 - 29 May 2007 Orji Uzor Kalu (b. 1960) 29 May 2007 - 29 May 2015 Theodore Ahamefule Orji (b. 1950) 29 May 2015 - 29 May 2023 Okezie Victor Ikpeazu (b. 1964) 29 May 2023 - Alex Otti (b. 1965)
